about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a terrifying MULTIPLAYER, COOPERATIVE, SURVIVAL HORROR adventure, set in the haunted corridors of an Eastern European orphanage in the 1980s. "Cult of the Child Eater" is a spine-chilling game for 2-6 players where teamwork, strategy and survival instinct are your only hope against the horror that lurk in the darkness.

Are you ready to escape the clutches of a satanic cult before it’s too late?

GAME ELEMENTS

  • Multiplayer Horror Experience: Play with your friends in a heart-pounding journey where teams either get by on their own or cooperate with the other teams. Try to escape the horror, each decision can mean life or death.

  • Cooperative and Competitive Gameplay: While teamwork is essential, your survival may force you to make competitive decisions against other teams.

  • Dynamic Puzzles and Traps: Each game session is different! Puzzles, traps, and creatures change with every playthrough, ensuring a unique and terrifying experience each time.

  • Hostile NPCs and Monsters: From vigilant caretakers to horrifying monsters born of séances, danger lurks around every corner. The ultimate enemy, the "Child Eater", is the most terrifying of them all—avoiding it may be your only hope.

  • Escape Room Mechanisms: Solve complex puzzles alone or with your team to progress. "Lukas’" notes provide crucial clues, but time is running out!

  • Explorable Areas: Traverse the main building, navigate the dangerous wings and uncover the secrets hidden at the back of the orphanage. Will you rush to escape with the boat or risk everything to find out the truth?

TEAM UP!

Working together makes things easier for everyone, but when a monster is after you, your survival becomes your only goal.

LOOT AND SOLVE!

Look for items that will help you escape, solve Puzzles, avoid traps and survive encounters with monsters.

RUN, HIDE & ESCAPE!

Always sneak around in the orphanage, but run if you have to run, hide if you have to hide and reach the boat to escape!

REPEAT!

To solve the mystery and undo the evil machinations of the cult, you must return and play the game again and again.

THE STORY

The game is set in Eastern Europe in the early 1980s. The orphans (players) must figure out how to escape alive from an orphanage that harbors terrible, evil secrets. The caretakers, priests and nuns, are members of a satanic cult and the time has come for the final séance where all the orphans are to be sacrificed to unleash demonic forces on the world and bring demonic power to earth by the "Child Eater".

Lukas, managed to escape and left behind an escape plan and various clues during his escape to help the players escape and reveal the story of the cult and the "Child Eater". Before Lukas escaped, he left this message:

"Tonight, when the lights go out, flee! Think carefully about which way you go! But remember: YOU MUST REACH THAT BOAT! Don't be afraid, because fear of the child feeds evil, and above all: AVOID THE CHILD EATER, otherwise you will be devoured by the darkness."

THE CULT WILL COME FOR YOU

Experience deep multiplayer horror with emotional and moral questions, mysterious story elements to discover, and variability as items, creatures and puzzles change with each new game.

Character development and secret story elements are revealed by playing through the game multiple times.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is set in an orphanage in Eastern Europe in the 1980s, where players take on the role of orphans who are being persecuted by a satanic sect that wants to sacrifice them for its own dark purposes. The game relies heavily on atmosphere, secrets and the players' fears. There is no explicit sexual content or direct depictions of violence. However, the game does contain slightly disfigured corpses, grotesque and repulsive monsters and the players' fallen avatars. The game does not show any direct rituals that could indicate child abuse. The interactions between the monsters and the players contain mild violence.
